Hi, Yossi
At Matbia, we’ve been working hard to continue making our system as user-friendly as possible.
Here’s how donating is about to become even easier and more convenient:
1. Immediate available funds
Your deposit will now be available immediately when you add funds. You’ll have the full amount available to donate to the organization of your choice.
2. API integration
We have released our official open API that allows third-party vendors to integrate with Matbia.
What this means: you can now use your Matbia card to donate on other online platforms or credit card terminals.
(Contact the organization that’s receiving your donation- they can request integration for the platform/terminal they’re using.)
3. Refer a Friend
Happy with Matbia? Let your friends join the revolution! Send your friends this link for a quick and easy card request:
https://matbia.org/?CardRequest
4. ‘Donation Request’ Card Setting
Have you ever been sure you want to give, but just need a moment to decide on the exact amount?
We’re pleased to offer a great new option for donating!
You can now program one of your card’s corners to send yourself a donation request. When you tap that corner on a device, you’ll recieve a donation request in your portal and a notification in your email.
You can decide later how much you wish to donate.
5. Create & manage Schedules Deposits/Donations
You can now easily manage all your scheduled deposits/donations in your portal. Just tap open your Schedule window and make your adjustments.
We’d love to hear your feedback on how you’re enjoying Matbia so far. Please reach out to us at info@matbia.com with any questions, comments, or concerns.
Thank you for being a part of Matbia, a simplified charity solution.
Please do not reply to this email
